storyBook.title: Our Story
storyBook.subtitle: The chapters that led us here

chapters.label: Chapter One
chapters.title: A Chance Encounter
chapters.text: Some stories begin with a grand gesture, but ours started with a quiet moment — a glance across a room, an unexpected conversation, and the feeling that something had just shifted.

chapters.label: Chapter Two
chapters.title: First Adventures
chapters.text: What started as coffee dates turned into long weekends exploring new places together. Every trip revealed something new — not just about the world, but about each other.

chapters.label: Chapter Three
chapters.title: Growing Together
chapters.text: Life isn't always easy, but facing it together made all the difference. Through late nights, big moves, and quiet evenings at home, we built something that felt unshakeable.

chapters.label: Chapter Four
chapters.title: The Question
chapters.text: There are moments you replay in your mind forever. A heartbeat of silence before the answer, and then — everything changed, and nothing changed at all.

chapters.label: Chapter Five
chapters.title: The Next Chapter
chapters.text: And now we stand at the beginning of something new. With all of you beside us, we're ready to write the rest of this story — together.
